item.title: Subconscious is the handle to change our life destination
item.description: Subconsciousness is the key to change our destination. I can see why it is world best selling a classic book. People know which book they must pick up for being a rich man.
item.content:encoded:
It’s all about Subconsciousness.

I’ve wished to achieve my dreams. Such as, Strong and Healthy body, Economical Freedom, Designing skill achievement etc.

This book so I had to pick it up as its best classic book for living in enriched life.

Napoleon Hill was an persistent interviewer. Even met the Andrew Carnegie who is the very well known as a King of steel. He has been my ideal model for living, as has built the number of libraries on United States of America. I assure that his libraries contributed to realize today’s USA.

Besides, Napoleon Hill had interviewed 500 millionaires who had succeeded in their living. It included ‘Tomas Edison’.

The first chapter describes about ‘Stick-ability’ on our dream to be realized.

It’s about

  • How much your desire is clearly defined
  • How much you devote the dream

There are a ton of failures and defeats though.

The Stick-ability is the key-ability as come first in this book as emphasized.

When we clearly seek our desire or dream, we subconscious focuses to have that desire. To grab the goal or want. When we keep thinking about the dream and desire, then our mind tunes the channel to achieve that as much as it can.

Why?

Our brain wants set align with Consciousness and Emotions in a same line. So When we see, visualize, hear, write, listen, discuss, and remind about it, Our subconscious thinks the desire is top priority for our survival.

Even we choose any options which seem closed with the desire ‘dream comes true’ in living.

Then How can we adjust this ‘Stickability’ principle into our living?

Drawing what you want

As much as you draw what you want to be, your brain will carve it into your subconscious. As Children doodle of it.

Keep an bucketlist album to arise the excitement

Having a ‘bucketlist’ album. Is tricking your brain. Visualization is super powerful. What you put into your brain influences you, and when you feel excited by re-open your fully exciting bucketlist album, Your brain will consider that is important for survival. That’s why you should have to keep an bucketlist album for your own.

Writing what you want be on an empty note whenever you can.

Being surround yourself with the ideal person or some people in same goal.

Your exposed surface would be expanded. Then Receiving influences which help you to be that ideal person or to achieve the goal.

other methods

  • Discussing all the time with the person
  • Keep chasing that goal even though you faces a lot of failures.
  • Break down the goal how can you achieve it. Mind-mapping can be the spot on method. or Drawing an flowchart

Conclusion

Life is tough, when we don’t know how to jump over the obstacle. For me, I was the person who always just changing my destination when a small failure encountered, then easily forgotten what I really want to realize in my life. I know that is obviously an attitude that most of average people choose. Every one does not want to bitter taste. When a bitter-stink moment visit our door, we don’t know how to do that. But this chapter shows me how to deal with it.

Most successful people were just encountered then, look up his goal again, then dust off his shoulder, then just keep moving on. Tomas Edison’s partner who Barnes had done with that ‘stick-ability’ to realize his dream, Henley Ford as well.

But Every single day, we should have to be clear what we really desire. Hill put the accent that our dream comes true when we truly staring our desire. We can achieve our dreams when we diligently remind ourselves.

item.title: Book review 'Art of Money Getting'
item.description: It seeds into me something that I can make myself to get closer at being rich by this easy simple classic. This book is beloved over around 200 years.
item.content:encoded:
Who is this author?

  • Major of Connecticut
  • The greatest show man
  • Anti-legislate Slavery
  • Northern American
  • Earned 500,000net(500,000 net (500,000net(15,366,000 in 2019)

Impressed quotes.

True economy is misapprehended, and people go through life without properly comprehending what that principle is.

Economy is not meanness.

You find good business men who save all the old envelopes, and scraps, and would not tear a new sheet of paper, if they could avoid it, for the world.

That we are born “free and equal” is a glorious truth in one sense, yet we are not all born equally rich, and we never shall be.

Most impressive & useful quotes.

In Chapter ‘Art Of Getting’

Saving an edge of income will lead you into prosperity.

True economy consists in always making the income exceed the out-go. Wear the old clothes a little longer if necessary; dispense with the new pair of gloves; mend the old dress; live on plainer food if need be; so that, under all circumstances, unless some unforeseen accident occurs, there will be a margin in favor of the income.

When you find that you have no surplus at the end of the year, and yet have a good income, I advise you to take a few sheets of paper and form them into a book and mark down every item of expenditure. Post it every day or week in two columns, one headed “necessaries” or even “comforts,” and the other headed “luxuries,” and you will find that the latter column will be double, treble, and frequently ten times greater than the former.

Dr. Franklin says “it is the eyes of others and not our own eyes which ruin us. If all the world were blind except myself I should not care for fine clothes or furniture.”

You cannot accumulate a fortune by taking the road that leads to poverty. It needs no prophet to tell us that those who live fully up to their means, without any thought of a reverse in this life, can never attain a pecuniary independence.

Men and women accustomed to gratify every whim and caprice, will find it hard, at first, to cut down their various unnecessary expenses, and will feel it a great self-denial to live in a smaller house than they have been accustomed to, with less expensive furniture, less company, less costly clothing, fewer servants, a less number of balls, parties, theater-goings, carriage-ridings, pleasure excursions, cigar-smokings, liquor-drinkings, and other extravagances; but, after all, if they will try the plan of laying by a “nest-egg,” or, in other words, a small sum of money, at interest or judiciously invested in land, they will be surprised at the pleasure to be derived from constantly adding to their little “pile,” as well as from all the economical habits which are engendered by this course.

Prosperity is a more severe ordeal than adversity, especially sudden prosperity. “Easy come, easy go,” is an old and true proverb. A spirit of pride and vanity, when permitted to have full sway, is the undying canker-worm which gnaws the very vitals of a man’s worldly possessions, let them be small or great, hundreds or millions.

Sounds explain why we should have a healthy body first.

The foundation of success in life is good health; that is the substratum of fortune; it is also the basis of happiness. A person cannot accumulate a fortune very well when he is sick. He has no ambition; no incentive; no force.

blaming addicted young man.

“grows by what it feeds on”

To make money, requires a clear brain. A man has got to see that two and two make four; he must lay all his plans with reflection and forethought, and closely examine all the details and the ins and outs of business. As no man can succeed in business unless he has a brain to enable him to lay his plans, and reason to guide him in their execution, so, no matter how bountifully a man may be blessed with intelligence, if the brain is muddled, and his judgment warped by intoxicating drinks, it is impossible for him to carry on business successfully.

Chapter : Use The Best Tools

Thoughtful man is right as hiring a man

He learns something every day, and you are benefited by the experience he acquires.

An important element in an employee is the brain. You can see bills up, “Hands Wanted,” but “hands” are not worth a great deal without “heads.

More than just his labor, we should have to consider about his ‘Brain’. How much he is thoughtful? How much his experiences will return some of profit for us? How much his hidden influences are big in shade? How much he owns the potentialities in many ways upon us? All above lines mean, ‘We should have to think about his affection more than just his hands’.

Chapter : Do not scatter your powers

Focus on only one business.

A constant hammering on one nail will generally drive it home at last, so that it can be clinched. When a man’s undivided attention is centered on one object, his mind will constantly be suggesting improvements of value

Many a fortune has slipped through a man’s fingers because he was engaged in too many occupations at a time.

It just sounds about me. I really do many things in a time. So It ended up that I do Video editing, Blogging, Youtube, Instagram, Blogging. However, I am thinking about the common sector in those actives. … nope… But a content creation is the way that I want to keep walking on.

Thus, It needs many skills in a term. A video editing to result a content. A text to planing to shape the imaging content. Yeah. I want to succeed as a great content creator.

But Just I use many tools at the same time. That’s it :) Hm, But I wanna accomplish only one skill as a major. I don’t know what it is.

Chapter : Advertise your business

A French writer says that “The reader of a newspaper does not see the first mention of an ordinary advertisement; the second insertion he sees, but does not read; the third insertion he reads; the fourth insertion, he looks at the price; the fifth insertion, he speaks of it to his wife; the sixth insertion, he is ready to purchase, and the seventh insertion, he purchases.”

Your object in advertising is to make the public understand what you have got to sell, and if you have not the pluck to keep advertising, until you have imparted that information, all the money you have spent is lost.

So a man who advertises at all must keep it up until the public know who and what he is, and what his business is, or else the money invested in advertising is lost.

Advertising and marketing is inevitable to make people understand who you are, what are you good at, what do you want to do. I need to keep it up. (This is good quote to upload on Instagram as everyone engaged with marketing himself)

Chapter : Do it with all your might

be diligent and be passionate on your business as much as you can

“Whatever is worth doing at all, is worth doing well.” Many a man acquires a fortune by doing his business thoroughly, while his neighbor remains poor for life, because he only half does it. Ambition, energy, industry, perseverance, are indispensable requisites for success in business.

“I will loose my camel, and trust it to God!” “No, no, not so,” said the prophet, “tie thy camel, and trust it to God!” Do all you can for yourselves, and then trust to Providence, or luck, or whatever you please to call it, for the rest.

Just I need to do as much as my capabilities are reaching out. ‘진인사대천명(盡人事待天命)’, 모사재인 성사재천(謀事在人成事在天, 谋事在人成事在天)’, Human do all best, but the result is up to the God.

Chapter : Don’t get above your business

Money is good for nothing unless you know the value of it by experience

Money isn’t valuable until you realize its value with your own experience.

they are striving to get rich quickly, and do not generally do their business as substantially and thoroughly as they should, but whoever excels all others in his own line, if his habits are good and his integrity undoubted, cannot fail to secure abundant patronage, and the wealth that naturally follows.

I just must follow up the way where is considered ‘right’. Hammering one nail does matter. Then It means that I should have to recognize which nail has to be targeted. Content creating? Growth knowledge? Sharing a content is what does it mean for us? It shows up who are we. It shows up how much we can value to them.

Wrapping up

Easy but profitable classic

I feel like that is quite good book. Besides, It feels like a bit easy, even though it’s my 3rd English book to be able to comprehend. Lovely. I don’t know how the mindset should be successful as a great show man, because I never experienced a circus. But he was an amusement oriented major who wanted to content his people. So Might be I already experienced his kinds of inventions before unconsciously. Anyway, His words have that we should have to refer.

His some lines reminds about my mate

Such as, Never waste all our money for living in ideal life style, but rather saving an edge of the budget to buy a 'nest-egg. Since My person wishes to enjoy her ideal living, we should have to consume all our budget which can be the budget to remain our creation of ‘nest-egg’. However, I cannot blame her, Rather I should have to say thanks to her. She made me meet those life-style to live in convenient. She brought so many handful items into kitchen and living room. Her items have brought me the experiences that cannot meet if I were living in my way.

I wanna have the comfortable amount of asset.

However, It doesn’t mean that we should keep this huddling life-style. I wanna overcome and grab that comfortable feeling from poverty. I wanna ban off the poor budget status. And wish to having the concern-free life style from poverty.

The Thought about advertising is impressive.

We have to advertise ourselves until the public understands who am I, What I want to do, What I’ll do. It sounds like a marketing. Most of us need own a business thus need on success of marketing. This author simply advises, ‘Continue it until people know about you enough’.

And the story of Genin hatter is quite interesting. People get impressed about the rumour ‘Genin Hatter’, then those sensations blow people to want to posses the hat ‘Genin’. then The Genin sells to the market the hats. Funnily grabbed the fortune.

How can we reach at there where we might feel so content without any concern about money? How can we make the income system to overcome our expenditure?:

I still in concern of it. So need to move on another book about ‘Being Rich and Making money’

item.title: Why being gratitude is needed?
item.description: Wrote the reason why we need to learn about being gratitude. It creates a virtuous circle near of us. Besides, It improves each individuals well-being and immunity as Dopamine, Serotonin, Oxytocin comes out
item.content:encoded:
Being Gratitude why it needs?

Even some rich people said, ‘Being Gratitude’ is the key to gain more yield Whatever I do. In my thought, When we say someone ‘Thanks’ with honest heart, the receiver release ‘Oxytocin’ which is feeling of happiness.

Then we feel so happy and find out our next step.

It gives the pleasure for receiver and presenter both.

‘Oh giving something to him or helping him is giving me the pleasure as well’

It can prevent an argument gets growing up.

It can even prevent a criticism to be shut down. When someone just want to advice about my result, then just you can reply ‘Thank you for your feed back’. Then no more criticism would be growing up from his mouth.

Even you can gives a good impression to people

Besides, I can give him a good impression or 3rd one who saw that my stance. They would gain more opportunity to like me or at least, we can lesser our distributions through this way. There are a tons of people who want to handle us like this. ‘GGon-Dae’. Just we need to say ‘Thank you for feed back, that I have a lot to learn’

And there is a lot additional profit Dopamine and Serotonin keeps coming out

Dopamine just empowers your activities.

Dopamine is the neurotransmitter to put myself into vicious circle. The circle will keep myself in happiness. Dopamine also engages with motivation. When you feel dopamine, thus you feel happy from that action, then you do more of it.

Appreciating myself also benefits myself.

Gratitude, no matter what it is targeting to, It releases Dopamine and Serotonin, which is happy hormone. Even when we say it from in front of a mirror. We can gain more profit from gratitude effect.

Writing gratitude journal for your living.

Consciously practicing gratitude strengthen our neural pathways.

Then what we have to do?

As we can see, the happy hormones comes out when we say ‘Thanks’. Then It does just increase the feeling of well-being.

Besides, when a community fulfilled with the members who say easily praise others and themselves, are gain more gratitude effects themselves.

The dopamine and serotonin. The hormones strengthen the community’s well-being and interpersonal vibe. Thus obviously link to greater productivity.

Our society isn’t quite happy in the feeling of each individuals. We can see that is symptom of lack of gratitude for each other. When we say Thanks to other’s judgement, we can cut the chain of vicious circle of unhappiness. Hope more awareness on the effect of happiness.

item.title: Blog made by Gatsby in 5H 45 Mins
item.description: An essay how was that making a monetize-able gatsby blog. To make money isn't an easy way!
item.content:encoded:
Build a blog with Gatsby for 5H 45 mins.

Wow.. super tired… It’s almost took 5h 45mins. So tired.

But I am not sure this blog can be monetize-able. Just alternatively chosen Gatsby as wanted to practice my coding.

I know Doing code writing is not the sub-job. That is quite energy consuming. Not easy to work with another creating.

Did it valuable?

I don’t know, but I can add monetization section in this blog. Thus This blog has some perks from it.

And I want to use this blog as a center of my influences by bridging all other Social Network Platforms of mine.

Then I’ll shows it up through this blog about my result and improvements every single day.

I know already a tons of times made-and-erased other blogs. But since I started Meditation and Yoga every morning, I can feel more sharply managing myself in better quality.

So, Long term keeping this blog would be no problem.

I want to grow up my capacity to earn by remote working.

However, I want to see it as a long journey. Obviously I need to improve my all skills, even though someone claims about it ‘Why don’t you follow 20:80 principle?‘.

I want to follow 20:80 rules, however, Life isn’t sure to be stay safe in mono-skill.

Video editing, I cannot just settle for secondary methods.

Youtube, It seems already overwhelmingly issued with most of subjects what I want to deal with.

Neuroscience, Stress management, Gain more productivities, etc. Those subjects are already fully charged by Doctors, and other healers. Of course, I must be a veteran with above skills as I need those managements with my brain to be fully functioning.

item.title: How to solve No Xcode or CLT version detected error in Mac
item.description: So funny, sometimes the error is smaller than I thought
item.content:encoded:
Error

No receipt for ‘com.apple.pkg.CLTools_Executables’ found at ’/‘.

No receipt for ‘com.apple.pkg.DeveloperToolsCLILeo’ found at ’/‘.

No receipt for ‘com.apple.pkg.DeveloperToolsCLI’ found at ’/‘.

gyp: No Xcode or CLT version detected!

Treatment

  1. sudo rm -rf $(xcode-select -print-path)
  2. xcode-select —install

Result

  1. 1 time error during Downloading Software about X minutes, xx Seconds.
  2. But again retried.
  3. Install success.
